name: sfchronicle
text:
When is a retailer a retailer, and when is it a marketplace?

A California bill, AB3262, would rid us of that riddle, at least when it comes to liability for defective products sold online, reports @OwenThomas in this week's Tech Chronicle:

https://t.co/N6hNgx5p4P
